title: L&T Tech Q4 results: Net profit rises 35% to Rs 262 cr, final dividend declared - Business Today
content: L&T Tech Q4 results: Net profit rises 35% to Rs 262 cr, final dividend declared  Business Today
description: Revenue from operations rose 22 per cent to Rs 1,756 crore in the quarter under review from Rs 1,440.50 crore in the same quarter last fiscal.
